meanings.definition: One who shoots a gun or other weapon.
meanings.sent1: The shooter aimed carefully at the target.
meanings.sent2: The police officer is a skilled shooter.
meanings.sent3: The shooter's aim was so good, they hit the bullseye every time.
meanings.sent4: In the movie, the hero was a sharpshooter, never missing a shot.
meanings.sent5: The shooter's precision with the gun was impressive.

meanings.definition: A small alcoholic drink typically consumed quickly.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they served shooters to the guests.
meanings.sent2: The bartender prepared a round of shooters for the group.
meanings.sent3: The friends enjoyed a few shooters before hitting the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The colorful shooters lined up on the bar looked tempting.
meanings.sent5: The fruity shooter had a strong kick to it.

meanings.sent1: The professional shooter captured stunning images at the event.
meanings.sent2: The wildlife shooter waited patiently for the perfect shot.
meanings.sent3: The wedding shooter made sure to get all the important moments on camera.
meanings.sent4: The fashion shooter's portfolio was filled with striking photos.
meanings.sent5: The talented shooter knew how to frame a picture beautifully.

meanings.definition: A plant stem with leaves or flowers.
meanings.sent1: The rose bush had a long, thorny shooter growing from its base.
meanings.sent2: The green shooter sprouted new leaves in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The tiny shooter on the succulent was starting to bloom.
meanings.sent4: The vine's shooter reached out towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The delicate shooter swayed gently in the breeze.
